list.title: Server
list.description: Server class

list.title: Server#includeDefaultBodyParsers
list.description: Includes/loads default express body parsers (json, text, urlencoded and multer) with recommended config into the Express app

list.title: Server#includeDefaultCompression
list.description: Includes/loads default compression (deflate, gzip) with recommended config into the Express app

list.title: Server#includeDefaultCookieParser
list.description: Includes/loads cookie parser with recommended config into the Express app

list.title: Server#includeDefaultCorsHeaders
list.description: Includes/loads default CORS headers with recommended config into the Express app

list.title: Server#includeDefaultSecurityHeaders
list.description: Includes/loads default security headers with recommended config into the Express app

list.title: Server#loadMiddlewares
list.description: Load global middlewares into the Express app

list.title: Server#loadRemixFramework
list.description: Attach a Remix Framework build to our Express server

list.title: Server#loadRouters
list.description: Load routers into the Express app

list.title: Server#loadStatic
list.description: Serves a static directory from the Express app

list.title: Server#run
list.description: Starts the Express server

list.title: Server#setEJSViewEngine
list.description: Sets the Express render engine to EJS

list.title: Server#setParameter
list.description: Sets an Express app parameter

list.title: module:Config
list.description: Builds/merges the config and then returns it as an array

list.title: module:Database
list.description: Initialize the database connection, connects models to Sequelize and syncs them

list.title: module:Logger
list.description: Creates an application logger

list.title: module:Runtime
list.description: Creates a user runtime/sandbox that monitors a users code, and kills the process is necessary
